title: LP gains
body: Anyone getting fairly high LP gains lately. Mine usually range between 16-20 but I've been getting 23-31 my last 10-15 games

replies.body: Always happens in the preseason. Happened last year for sure.

yes.... maybe riot fixed their stuff.

gaining more and losing less, instead of the usual lose more gain less.

(still stuffed though, had 2 games with a 25 gain in a row, yet only received 46 total)
